thread.title: Want to Recreate the LG G6's Rounded Display on Your Phone? There's an App for That!
thread.title_full: Want to Recreate the LG G6's Rounded Display on Your Phone? There's an App for That!

title: Want to Recreate the LG G6's Rounded Display on Your Phone? There's an App for That!
text:
It looks like the phone has a defective display and needs warranty service. CabbageHeadCat. 
I know you chose the white Pixel for contrast, but is there an option for white corners? 
Blue Pixel owner here and am too poor to buy a superior G6. :-/ John Clausen 
I used to use an app called Roundr back in the day that did the same thing. I reinstalled it a few weeks ago, and it didnâ€™t draw over my Moto Zâ€™s nav bar, so it looks stupid. I had to pay the $.99 (for only 99 cents, who cares) to get that effect, but it looks great. Cool app. Rashad 
Not for me but the idea isnâ€™t a bad one. Guilherme 
The effect should be better in black phones. dcvolcom909 
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/6ba5fb59743f701369fd9cafd32aeb524075bce0fd8feda008177be3f472c4de.jpg middlehead 
This is the dumbest thing Iâ€™ve seen all day. Anyone who pays for that needs to have control of their finances taken away from them. Pedro 
Thatâ€™s the dumbest comment Iâ€™ve seen all day. Anyone who makes this comment needs to have their keyboard taken away from them. 
Android is about choice. DanG 
So this app is for poor people who want to get G6, but got stuck with Pixel? LightofHonor 
Or people who fondly remember the Palm Pre ðŸ™‚ CabbageHeadCat. 
Would be good if you could have an option for black or white corners. 
I know you chose the white Pixel for contrast, but is this an option? About Droid Life
